title: IT Project Manager
description: In PM role I was responsible for carrying out projects related to one product's family. I got also an opportunity to participate in long-term strategic planning and development of products' vision. During realization of projects, it was crucial to meet requirements of different B2B customers but at the same time align those short term activities to strategic plan. At the end, the effort and comprehensive approach paid off leading to introduce the product to a new market segment.

details.title: See key responsibilities
items: Managing of IT projects related to development of online gaming platform
Responsible for setting out a long-term vision of product family developed during realized projects
Requirements gathering and analysis (B2B projects for international customers)
Time and budget management (6 - 12 months projects)
Human Resources Management (25+ members of project team)
Using PMBOK or agile (SCRUM and Kanban) approach depending on project needs
